name: Continuing Italian (Offered in Florence)
description: This course consists of a thorough review of grammatical structures and is designed to improve the students' self-expressiveness in Italian. Selections from contemporary authors and passages dealing with present-day issues are used as a basis for discussion in Italian. For students whose background in Italian is solely academic. [48L, 24P]
prerequisites: ITA100Y5/ITA101Y5 or permission of the department.
